Back to Billy

Bring the Pork Belly Pie to Billy Maclure at the Maclure Vineyards.
Pork Belly Pie

Description

Here you go. And when you give this pie to that Billy, you tell him I hope he chokes on it!

Progress

Ugh... I'm starving! Do you have that pie for me, <name>?

Completion

Mm, yum! This pie is the best!

I think my memory is coming back to me...

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 135 Experience
  • 25 Reputation with Stormwind
